home.title: Customer Area
home.p:
You are in the customer's area. We offer the following online services:
Update your personal data
You can update your name, address, telephone, email, username and password.
Add your buying profile
You can provide us the property profile you are interested and if you want to buy, rent, etc...
Tell us your favorite cities
You can select a group of cities that interest you.
Add a property for sale
Additionally, you can add a new property to publish.
